XIII.ii.3.A.1.a
.
Establishment of Criteria for Preference in Admissions to Public Housing
Local public housing authorities establish the criteria for preference in admissions to public housing.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Certificate of Preference for Public Housing
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
